bill.title: Taxation; revise rate of interest assessed on underpayment or nonpayment of income, withholding, franchise and sales taxes.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Sections 27-7-51, 27-7-53 And 27-7-327, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Reduce Certain Interest Assessments That May Be Made By The Commissioner Of Revenue For Underpayment And Nonpayment Of Tax Under The Income Tax Law From 1% To 1-1/2% Per Month; To Amend Section 27-13-23 And 27-13-25, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Reduce Certain Interest Assessments That May Be Made By The Commissioner Of Revenue For Underpayment And Nonpayment Of Tax Under The Franchise Tax Law From 1% To 1-1/2% Per Month; To Amend Section 27-65-39, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Reduce Certain Interest Assessments That May Be Made By The Commissioner Of Revenue For Underpayment And Nonpayment Of Tax Under The Sales Tax Law From 1% To 1-1/2% Per Month; And For Related Purposes.
